knimeNode.name: Download / Upload from List
knimeNode.shortDescription: Copy files contained in a list from one (remote) location to another.

fullDescription.intro: This node copies files contained in the input table from one location to another. The location may be a remote location.
fullDescription.option: Column of the input table with the URIs to the files that should be copied.
Column of the input table with the URIs to where the files should be copied.

How to handle already existing files.
Overwrite
Overwrite the existing file.
Overwrite if newer
Overwrite the existing file only, if the file to copy is newer.
Abort
Abort the execution of the node.

ports.inPort: Table containing the list of files that should be copied and where they should be copied to.
Port object containing the connection information to the server. (Optional)
